title: The Ghastling: Book Fourteen
description: The Ghastling’s fourteenth offering is our ‘Inhabitants’ issue, featuring tales of cabin fever, weird tenants, strange neighbours, possessed workmates, haunted children and other uninvited inhabitants. Also includes a ‘cut-out-and-keep’ Ouija board, in case you wish to make friends with that knocking sound in your airing cupboard.Includes stories from Mike Adamson, Timothy Granville, Verity Holloway, Janice Leadingham, Anna Ojinnaka, Simon John Parkin, Sinéad Persaud, Matthew G. Rees and Ashley Stokes.
author: Rebecca Parfitt
